instruction: Design a Sample Generator component for testing purposes
response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ipxact:component xmlns:ipxact='http://www.accellera.org/XMLSchema/IPXACT/1685-2014'>
  <ipxact:vendor>tut.fi</ipxact:vendor>
  <ipxact:library>examples</ipxact:library>
  <ipxact:name>SampleGenerator</ipxact:name>
  <ipxact:version>1.0</ipxact:version>
  <!-- Additional XML content defining the Sample Generator component -->
</ipxact:component>
